EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email invitation template for survey: IPro Media ~ Installation
EmailTemplate.name: [Send using Timba Surveys] IPro Media ~ Installation
EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete this survey: IPro Media ~ Installation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We hope that your recent installation met your expectations. We look for forward to meeting your business communications needs for many years to come. In order to assist us in improving our customer satisfaction, Please complete this short survey located at: %SURVEY_URL%
Thank you very much.
Sincerely,
Richard Bell President IPro Media, Inc
_____________________________________________________________________ Surveys Made Easy by Timba Surveys http://sfproducts.altimetrik.com/forums
